00029 class cComponentType;
00030 class cProperties;
00031 class cDisplayString;
00032 class cRNG;
00033 class cStatistic;
00034 
00041 class SIM_API cComponent : public cDefaultList //implies noncopyable
00042 {
00043     friend class cPar; // needs to call handleParameterChange()
00044     friend class cChannel; // allow it to access FL_INITIALIZED
00045     friend class cModule; // allow it to access FL_INITIALIZED
00046 
00047   private:
00048     enum {
00049       FL_PARAMSFINALIZED = 4,   // whether finalizeParameters() has been called
00050       FL_INITIALIZED = 8,       // whether initialize() has been called
00051       FL_EVLOGENABLED = 16,     // whether logging via ev<< is enabled
00052       FL_DISPSTR_CHECKED = 32,  // for hasDisplayString(): whether the FL_DISPSTR_NOTEMPTY flag is valid
00053       FL_DISPSTR_NOTEMPTY = 64, // for hasDisplayString(): whether the display string is not empty
00054     };
00055 
00056   protected:
00057     cComponentType *componenttype;  // component type object
00058 
00059     short rngmapsize;  // size of rngmap array (RNGs>=rngmapsize are mapped one-to-one to physical RNGs)
00060     int *rngmap;       // maps local RNG numbers (may be NULL if rngmapsize==0)
00061 
00062     short paramvsize;
00063     short numparams;
00064     cPar *paramv;  // array of cPar objects
00065 
00066     cDisplayString *dispstr; // display string (created on demand)
00067 
00068   public:
00069     // internal: currently used by Cmdenv
00070     void setEvEnabled(bool e)  {setFlag(FL_EVLOGENABLED,e);}
00071     bool isEvEnabled() const  {return flags&FL_EVLOGENABLED;}
00072 
00073     // internal: invoked from within cEnvir::getRNGMappingFor(component)
00074     void setRNGMap(short size, int *map) {rngmapsize=size; rngmap=map;}
00075 
00076     // internal: sets associated cComponentType for the component;
00077     // called as part of the creation process.
00078     virtual void setComponentType(cComponentType *componenttype);
00079 
00080     // internal: adds a new parameter to the component; called as part of the creation process
00081     virtual void addPar(cParImpl *value);
00082 
00083     // internal: reallocates paramv (size must be >= numparams)
00084     void reallocParamv(int size);
00085 
00086     // internal: save parameters marked with "save-as-scalars=true"
00087     virtual void recordParametersAsScalars();
00088 
00089     // internal: has finalizeParameters() been called?
00090     bool parametersFinalized() const {return flags&FL_PARAMSFINALIZED;}
00091 
00092     // internal: has initialize() been called?
00093     bool initialized() const {return flags&FL_INITIALIZED;}
00094 
00095     // internal: used from Tkenv: find out if this module has a display string.
00096     // getDisplayString() would create the object immediately which we want to avoid.
00097     bool hasDisplayString();
00098 
00099   protected:
00119 
00124     virtual void initialize(int stage) {if (stage==0) initialize();}
00125 
00131     virtual int numInitStages() const  {return 1;}
00132 
00137     virtual void initialize();
00138 
00143     virtual void finish();
00144 
00165     virtual void handleParameterChange(const char *parname);
00167 
00168   public:
00178     cComponent(const char *name = NULL);
00179 
00183     virtual ~cComponent();
00185 
00191     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00193 
00201     virtual void finalizeParameters();
00202 
00209     virtual cProperties *getProperties() const = 0;
00210 
00214     cComponentType *getComponentType() const;
00215 
00223     virtual const char *getNedTypeName() const;
00224 
00228     virtual bool isModule() const  {return false;}
00229 
00235     virtual cModule *getParentModule() const = 0;
00236 
00241     cRNG *getRNG(int k) const  {return ev.getRNG(k<rngmapsize ? rngmap[k] : k);}
00243 
00249 
00253     virtual void callInitialize() = 0;
00254 
00259     virtual bool callInitialize(int stage) = 0;
00260 
00265     virtual void callFinish() = 0;
00267 
00270 
00274     virtual int getNumParams() const  {return numparams;}
00275 
00280     virtual cPar& par(int k);
00281 
00286     const cPar& par(int k) const  {return const_cast<cComponent *>(this)->par(k);}
00287 
00292     virtual cPar& par(const char *parname);
00293 
00298     const cPar& par(const char *parname) const  {return const_cast<cComponent *>(this)->par(parname);}
00299 
00304     virtual int findPar(const char *parname) const;
00305 
00309     bool hasPar(const char *s) const {return findPar(s)>=0;}
00311 
00318     cDisplayString& getDisplayString();
00319 
00323     void setDisplayString(const char *dispstr);
00324 
00329     void bubble(const char *text);
00331 
00334 
00338     void recordScalar(const char *name, double value, const char *unit=NULL);
00339 
00343     void recordScalar(const char *name, SimTime value, const char *unit=NULL) {recordScalar(name, value.dbl(), unit);}
00344 
00349     void recordStatistic(cStatistic *stats, const char *unit=NULL);
00350 
00355     void recordStatistic(const char *name, cStatistic *stats, const char *unit=NULL);
00357 };
